lead_paragraph: Stock indexes edged up a bit, helped by gains in big technology companies including Google, Amazon and Microsoft.

headline.print_headline: Slight Gains Close Out a Robust Week for the Market
headline.main: Market Closes Slightly Higher on Tech Earnings

snippet: Stock indexes edged up a bit, helped by gains in big technology companies including Google, Amazon and Microsoft.
abstract: Investors react positively to quarterly results posted by Google, Microsoft and Amazon, advancing stocks slightly.
